text: @IvankaTrump @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Your dumb dumb daddy is responsible for the sufferings and deaths of people from Coronavirus for playing golf and sitting on his fat a** while calling it a Democrat Hoax and didn’t do a damn thing! He should be kicked out office and all of you spoilt brats too!!!
